overview: A most memorable fantasy involving two hardworking moving men in Scarlet Chambers, Marilyn plays a Southern Belle who's more than just little fascinated with her slave's physique. Finally, in Abduction, she takes on three "low life" degenerates and meets up with "Tantala." A bizarre and frightening dominatrix four of the most shockingly erotic fantasies ever filmed are yours for the taking.
tagline: Her Fantasies Are Beyond Your Wildest Dreams!
title: Marilyn Chambers' Private Fantasies 2
